video_prompt: Young woman's subtle head tilt, slight shift in posture. Fabric ripples. Water reflects changing light. Dappled sunlight on foliage shimmers, leaves sway. Background architecture subtly alters as viewer's perspective shifts slightly.
image_prompt: Anime woman, dark shoulder-length hair, blue eyes, fair skin, subtle blush, sitting gracefully in a loose indigo blue floral kimono. Bare legs extended. Warm dappled sunlight outdoors, lush green foliage. Sitting on dark reflective surface with subtle blue/orange reflections. Background: teal/green gabled building (greenhouse/cabin) and a solitary red flower. Serene, natural beauty.
refined_video_prompt: A young woman's head subtly tilts, her posture gently shifting. Fabric softly ripples. Water actively reflects dynamic light changes. Sunlight dappling through foliage causes leaves to shimmer and sway. Background architecture subtly transforms as the viewer's perspective fluidly adjusts.
